description.ko: 완벽한 기하학적 형태가 시스템적 글리치에 의해 산산조각 나는 붕괴하는 디지털 현실의 시각적 연구입니다.
description.en: A visual study of a collapsing digital reality, where perfect geometric forms are shattered by systemic glitches.

prompt: A brutalist #1A1A1A obsidian sphere suspended in a clinical #FFFFFF digital vacuum, undergoing a violent geometric deconstruction. The surface fractures into a recursive storm of sharp #808080 shards and #C0C0C0 pixel-sorted glitches. High-contrast cinematic lighting reveals razor-sharp raytraced reflections on fragmented glass-like surfaces. The composition emphasizes chaos within order through digital noise, scanlines, and intense chromatic aberration. 8k resolution, Unreal Engine 5 aesthetic, sharp vector precision.
